title: 2 Bedroom Apartment Home Available at Woodway Village. Call NOW!
posting_body: Our 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartment homes and townhouses include large bedrooms with ample closet space, central air-conditioning, fully equipped kitchens & an attached garage with EVERY HOME!
Located just a short drive from Downtown Austin, near many dining, shopping, and entertainment options right outside of your front door.
Our community offers a sparkling outdoor pool, picnic & BBQ areas, on-site daycare, and an outdoor playground & dog park!
At Woodway Village, we take care of our residents.
If you would like to learn more, make sure you call soon and schedule your tour.
Corridor - Just a Few Minutes from Downtown Austin
*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.
Woodway Village participates in an affordable housing program.
Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $46,380 | 2 Occupants: $52,980 | 3
To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.
Call today to learn more about our community:
